about_the_game:
This Flames and Ashes Pack includes 14 furniture items, 9 clothing items, 1 mount, and 2 pets.

Calling all Fire Elementals! The Flames and Ashes Pack has 26 fire-themed outfits and furniture items available for you to customize your characters and decorate your homes, sheds, and farms.

Pack includes:
  • Fire Furniture Set: Magmastone Bed, Ember Couch, Magmastone Couch, Coal Couch, Wildfire Chair, Ember Chair, Coal Chair, Coal Table, Magmastone Table, Magmastone End Table, Coal Wardrobe, Magmastone Wardrobe, Coal End Table, and Fire Lamp
  • Flame Jester Outfit Set: Flame Jester Hat, Flame Jester Shirt, and Flame Jester Pants
  • Blazing Hot Outfit Set: Blazing Hot Earrings and Blazing Hot Gown
  • Flaming Feather Outfit Set: Flaming Feather Hat, Flaming Feather Cape, Flaming Pin Stripe Suit Jacket, and Flaming Pin Stripe Pants
  • Flaming Horse Mount
  • Flambe, the Flame Pet
  • Ember, the Fire Fox Pet
